mapper.select: select j.id,j.name,j.type,j.personnum,j.place,j.salary,u.id as uid,u.name as uname from job j,user u where j. user_id =u.id and j.status=0 order by j.createtime desc LIMIT 4

select j.id,j.name,j.type,j.personnum,j.place,j.information,j.salary,j.contact,j.createtime,j.status,u.id as uid,u.name as uname,phone from job j,user u where j. user_id =u.id and j.id=#{id} and j.status=0

select j.id,j.name,j.type,j.personnum,j.place,j.information,j.salary,j.contact,j.createtime,j.status,u.id as uid,u.name as uname,phone from job j,user u where j. user_id =u.id and j.id=#{id} and j.status!=3

select j.id,j.name,j.type,j.personnum,j.place,j.information,j.salary,j.contact,j.createtime,j.status,u.id as uid,u.name as uname,phone from job j,user u where j. user_id =u.id and j.user_id=#{userid} and j.status !=3
select j.id,j.name,j.type,j.personnum,j.place,j.information,j.salary,j.contact,j.createtime,j.status,u.id as uid,u.name as uname,phone from job j,user u where j. user_id =u.id

select j.id,j.name,j.type,j.personnum,j.place,j.information,j.salary,j.contact,j.createtime,j.status,u.id as uid,u.name as uname,phone from job j,user u where j. user_id =u.id
